EmailTemplate.name: CBSA-EN.EM-3-CBSA-EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t let your workplace define you. Here’s how.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Six in ten Canadians believe their employer has some responsibility in ensuring their good health. We believe this too. That’s why we created this guide to help you redefine your workplace environment. Read it now to discover why the right office furniture contributes to more productivity, more collaboration and higher overall wellbeing.
We’ve got your back. Read it now. <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/rs/720-MXC-641/images/FG-Workspaces-Brochure_EN.pdf]]>
Best, Julie Hayter Government Account Manager | Directeur De Comptes If you're having difficulty accessing the link in this email, please copy and paste the following link into your web browser: https://go.grandandtoy.com/rs/720-MXC-641/images/FG-Workspaces-Brochure_EN.pdf 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: juliehayter@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:juliehayter@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 613-851-4630 E-mail: FederalServices@grandandtoy.com | Tel: 866-511-4534 | Fax: 877-214-3958 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/gov/?cmp=ABM-FedGov-RCMP&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
